execution_plan.description: Retrieve all orders from the US region (orders table in sales_us). These will be tested to see if their customer exists in the other region (EU) but has no orders there.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS order_id, customer_id, total_eur, updated_at, coupon_code FROM orders;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customer IDs from the EU region (customers table in sales_eu). Used to check if a US-order's customer exists in EU.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id FROM customers;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all orders from the EU region (orders table in sales_eu). Used to determine which EU customers actually have orders in EU.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS order_id, customer_id, total_eur, updated_at, coupon_code FROM orders;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customer IDs from the US region (customers table in sales_us). Used to check if an EU-order's customer exists in US.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id FROM customers;
